Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.control

Class CLIMessageBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.control.CLIMessageBuilder
public class CLIMessageBuilder extends Object
This class contains static methods used by the CLI to construct the message to be sent to the Controller and then forwarded to the server.
See Also:
  • Controller
  • CLI

    • assignUsername

      private static void assignUsername(Scanner stdin, Controller controller, com.google.gson.JsonObject o) throws CLIMessageBuilder.ApplicationQuitException
      Helper method used to assign a username to the message. Also used to update the game's info with the said username.
      Parameters:
      stdin - the input scanner
      controller - the application's controller
      o - the message to build
      Throws:
      CLIMessageBuilder.ApplicationQuitException - if the user wants to quit the application

    • assignNumPlayersAndExpertMode

      private static void assignNumPlayersAndExpertMode(Scanner stdin, Controller controller, com.google.gson.JsonObject o) throws CLIMessageBuilder.ApplicationQuitException
      Helper method used to assign the number of players and the expert mode the message. Also used to update the game's info with them.
      Parameters:
      stdin - the input scanner
      controller - the application's controller
      o - the message to build
      Throws:
      CLIMessageBuilder.ApplicationQuitException - if the user wants to quit the application
